doctor.title: Dɔkota Nimdeɛ Akwankyerɛ
doctor.description: Nya apɔmuden ho afotuo ne nsɛmmisa wɔ adɔkota a wɔnim wɔn adwuma mu. Nya ɔhwɛ a wohia, bere a wohia.

welcome.title: Akwaaba Lifeline
welcome.subtitle: Wo yɔnko paa ma ahokyere. Siesie woho na wode ahotoso ayɛ adwuma bere a sɛkɛnd biara ho hia.

tips.title: Ahoɔhare Nkwagyeɛ wɔ wo Nsateaa so
tips.subtitle: Nya akwankyerɛ a ɛho da hɔ ma ahokyere biara, mpo sɛ wo nni intanɛt koraa
tips.handleSharpObjects: Di nneɛma a ano yɛ nam ho dwuma yiye:
tips.handleSharpObjectsContent: Twa nneɛma wɔ wo ho akyi na ma sekan no ano nyɛ nam sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wobɛdi ho dwuma yiye.
tips.stayHydratedContent: Nom nsuo pii da mu nyinaa na ama wo apɔmuden ayɛ yiye.
tips.washHandsContent: Nsa hohoroo pii boa ma mmoawa ne yadeɛ ntrɛ.
tips.takeBreaks: Gye wo ahome wɔ screen anim:
tips.takeBreaksContent: Ma w'ani ngye ahome simma 20 biara mu na amma w'ani anyɛ ɔhaw.
tips.getSleepContent: Bɔ mmɔden sɛ wobɛda nnɔnhwerew 7-9 anadwo biara na ama wo apɔmuden ayɛ yiye.

unique.title: SIESIE WO HO MA WO NKOAA AHIADEƐ
unique.description: Fa wo apɔmuden abakɔsɛm, nneɛma a ɛma wo ho yerɛ wo ne ɔhaw mu nkyerɛ nwoma sie, ma wo anaa nkwagyefoɔ atumi ahu ntɛm

bot.title: AI Boafo a Ɔyɛ Aduruyɛfoɔ
bot.description: Akwaba! Me ne wo aduruyɛ kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ. Nya mmoa ntɛmntɛm fi yɛn AI boafo hɔ.
bot.welcomeMessage: Hello! I'm your Lifeline First Aid Assistant. I can help with emergency medical information and first aid procedures. What would you like to know?
bot.placeholder: Ask me anything about first aid...
bot.errorMessage: I'm sorry, but I can only help with health and medical-related questions. Please ask me about first aid, medical emergencies, or health topics.

localResponses.cpr:
For CPR: 1) Call emergency services first. 2) Place the heel of your hand on the center of the chest. 3) Push hard and fast (100-120 compressions per minute). 4) If trained, give 2 breaths after every 30 compressions.

Remember: For any serious emergency, always call professional help immediately.
localResponses.choking:
For a choking adult/child:
1) Ask "Are you choking?"
2) If they can cough, encourage coughing.
3) If they can't breathe, perform abdominal thrusts (Heimlich maneuver):
   - Stand behind, wrap arms around waist
   - Make a fist above navel
   - Grasp fist with other hand
   - Give quick upward thrusts
4) Continue until object is expelled or person becomes unconscious.
localResponses.burn:
For minor burns:
1) Cool under running water for 10-15 minutes
2) Remove jewelry/clothing near burn
3) Cover with sterile non-stick dressing
4) Don't apply butter, oil or ice

For serious burns (large, deep, or on face/hands):
1) Call emergency services
2) Don't remove stuck clothing
3) Cover loosely with clean cloth
4) Monitor for shock
localResponses.bleeding:
To control bleeding:
1) Apply direct pressure with clean cloth
2) Elevate injured area if possible
3) Add more layers if blood soaks through
4) Don't remove original dressing
5) If severe, call emergency services

For nosebleeds:
1) Sit upright, lean forward
2) Pinch soft part of nose for 10 minutes
3) Apply ice to bridge of nose
4) Avoid blowing nose afterward
localResponses.whoAreYou: I'm Lifeline Assistant, your AI first aid helper. I provide emergency medical guidance and first aid instructions. I was created by the Lifeline team to help people get accurate medical information quickly. For serious emergencies, always contact professional medical services immediately.
localResponses.whatCanYouDo:
I can help with:
- First aid instructions
- Emergency response guidance
- Basic medical information
- Wound care
- CPR instructions
- Handling burns, fractures, poisoning

I always recommend contacting professional medical help for serious situations.

privacyPolicy.seeMore: Hwɛ Nkateaseɛ Ho Nhyehyɛe No Nyinaa

intro.privacyImportant: Wo nkateaseɛ ho hia yɛn. Nkateaseɛ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ yi kyerɛ sɛnea yɛboaboa, yɛde di dwuma, yɛkyerɛ, na yɛbɔ ho ban wo wo app no mu.
intro.howWeCollect: Yɛboaboa nneɛma a wode ma yɛn, te sɛ bere a woyɛ wo account, de yɛn nneɛma di dwuma, anaasɛ wokasa akyerɛ yɛn.
intro.policyExplains: Nhyehyɛɛ yi kyerɛ yɛn adwumayɛ wɔ nneɛma a yɛboaboa, sɛnea yɛde di dwuma, ne sɛnea yɛkyerɛ wo nkateaseɛ ho.

share.title: Kyɛ Lifeline App No
share.message: Hwɛ saa app a ɛboa wo wɔ ɔhaw mu yi: https://lifeline-mu.vercel.app/

informationWeCollect.title: Nneɛma a Yɛboaboaa
informationWeCollect.description1: Yɛboaboa nneɛma a wode ma yɛn, te sɛ bere a woyɛ wo account, de yɛn nneɛma di dwuma, anaasɛ wokasa akyerɛ yɛn. Ebetumi aka wo din, wo email adrɛs, wo telefon nɔma, ne afoforo a ɛfa wo ho anaasɛ ɛkyerɛ wo ho.
informationWeCollect.description2: Yɛn nso boaboa nneɛma a ɛfa wo device ne sɛnea wodi nkitahodi ne yɛn app no ho, ebi ne IP adrɛs, device tebea, operating system, ne nneɛma a wode di dwuma ho nkɔsoɔ.

howWeUseInformation.title: Sɛnea Yɛde Wo Nkateaseɛ Di Dwuma
howWeUseInformation.description: Yɛde nneɛma a yɛboaboaa no di dwuma sɛ yɛbɛma yɛn nneɛma ayɛ yiye, yɛbɛhwɛ sɛ nneɛma no ayɛ yiye, yɛbɛma wo nkɔmbɔ a ɛfa ho no, yɛbɛma wo nkyerɛkyerɛmu ne nsɛmmisa, na yɛbɛma wo nkɔsoɔ mu mmoa.

informationSharing.title: Nkateaseɛ Atoatoa Ho Nkyerɛkyerɛmu
informationSharing.description: Yɛntɔn wo nkateaseɛ mma obiara. Ebia yɛbɛkyerɛ wo nkateaseɛ kɔma adwumayɛfo a wɔyɛ adwuma ma yɛn, bere a mmara ka sɛ yɛmmfa nkyerɛ, anaasɛ sɛ yɛpɛ sɛ yɛbɔ yɛn ho ban.

dataSecurity.title: Nkateaseɛ Ho Nkwaadɔm
dataSecurity.description: Yɛde nhyehyɛe pa ne adwumayɛbea nhyehyɛe a ɛfata di dwuma sɛ yɛbɛbɔ wo nkateaseɛ ho ban. Nanso, ɔkwan biara a wɔfa so de nneɛma kɔ internet so anaa wɔde sie wɔ ɛlɛktronik mu nnyɛ 100% a wotumi gye atia.

yourRights.title: Wo Ntamadan
yourRights.description: Wotumi wɔ tumi bi wɔ wo nkateaseɛ so, ebi ne sɛ wobɛhunu, wobɛsesa, anaasɛ wobɛpam wo nkateaseɛ. Yɛsrɛ sɛ kɔka yɛn nkyerɛ sɛ wopɛ sɛ wodi dwuma saa tumi yi.

childrenPrivacy.title: Mmofra Nkateaseɛ Ho Nkwaadɔm
childrenPrivacy.description: Yɛn adwuma nnyɛ dea mmofra a wɔwɔ mfe 13 ase. Yɛnnim sɛ yɛboaboa nkateaseɛ fi mmofra a wɔwɔ mfe 13 ase hɔ. Sɛ yɛahu sɛ yɛaboaboa nkateaseɛ fi ɔba a ɔwɔ mfe 13 ase hɔ a, yɛbɛyɛ ade sɛ yɛbɛpam nkateaseɛ no ntɛm ara.

changesToPolicy.title: Nsesaeɛ Wɔ Nhyehyɛɛ Yi Mu
changesToPolicy.description: Ebia yɛbɛsesa Nkateaseɛ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ yi bere biara. Yɛbɛkyerɛ wo sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a yɛbɛkyerɛ wo sɛnea ɛbɛyɛ a wubetumi ahu Nkateaseɛ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ foforo a ɛwɔ saa krataafa yi so na yɛbɛsesa 'Bere a Wɔsesaa No' da no.

contactUs.title: Ka Yɛn Ho
contactUs.description: Sɛ wowɔ nsɛmmisa biara a ɛfa Nkateaseɛ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ yi ho a, yɛsrɛ sɛ kɔka yɛn ho wɔ support@lifelineapp.com.

internationalDataTransfers.title: Nkateaseɛ Nsakraeɛ Wɔ Amanaman Nkabom Mu
internationalDataTransfers.description: Wobetumi de wo nkateaseɛ akɔ wɔn a wɔwɔ aman a wɔn mmara yɛ ne deɛ ɛwɔ wo man mu nyinaa. Ebia wɔde wo nkateaseɛ bɛkɔ aman a wɔn nkwaadɔm mmara yɛ ne deɛ ɛwɔ wo man mu nyinaa.

lastUpdated.title: Bere a Wɔsesaa No
lastUpdated.description: Wɔsesaa Nkateaseɛ Ho Nhyehyɛɛ yi wɔ August 12, 2025.
